name: Flip'Orbit
description:
In Flip'Orbit your goal is to try to keep balls from falling inside a black hole. To prevent that you are able to use giant space paddles to bounce them back into outter space. The problem is that black holes have a huge gratational pull and so the balls will always come back...

Once you've bounced back the first ball enough times you can use giant canons to fire a second one, each time the balls hit a bumper you gain score points. If you manage to hit a ball with the smaller paddle you gain more of the energy used to create a new ball.

Controls :

Spacebar: Launch a ball  
Q/D OR A/D OR ←/→ : Rotate the paddles
Enter : Restart the game

A game made in a week by CHEDAL Dorian, LAJMI Mohamed, FLEGO Lucas, ZAZOUA Yanis and DUBOIS-VERGIAT Iris during their second year at Institut de Création et d'Animation Numérique(ICAN) in Paris.
